Package tv.ouya.console.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OuyaErrorCodes
    Error codes that can be returned to by a Listener's onFailure() method.
    OuyaInputMapper.RemappedEventDispatcher
    The interface for receiving remapped input events from the OuyaInputMapper.
    OuyaResponseListener<T>
    Represents a listener for asynchronous replies from the Ouya server to requests made through the OuyaFacade.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CancelIgnoringJsonResponseListener<T>  
    CancelIgnoringOuyaResponseListener<T>
    Utility base class for listeners that don't expect to receive cancel notifications or which don't have to do anything if the user clicks "Cancel." This class implements an empty onCancel() method so that you don't have to litter your code with onCancel() methods that will never be called.
    GamerIdentity  
    GamerInfo  
    JsonResponseListener<T>  
    OuyaActivity
    Extend the OuyaActivity and your onGenericMotionEvent, onKeyUp, and onKeyDown events will behave as though your input device is an OuyaController.
    OuyaAuthenticationHelper
    This class can handle any authentication errors which come from the server and bring up user account request prompts appropriately.
    OuyaController
    Utility class that contains codes for console buttons and axes.
    OuyaController.ButtonData
    The drawable & displayable name for a specific button.
    OuyaEncryptionHelper  
    OuyaFacade
    Entry point for the OUYA API.
    OuyaFacade.DeviceHardware  
    OuyaInputMapper  
    OuyaIntent  
    OuyaPurchaseHelper
    Helper for OUYA purchases.
    Product
    Represents a product available for in-app purchase.
    Purchasable
    Represents an item that can be purchased.
    PurchaseResult
    Copyright 2014 OUYA
    Receipt
    Represents a purchase that successfully occurred in the past.
    RequestRunnable<T>
    Base class for requests which are to be made to a service.

    Enum Description
    OuyaFacade.DeviceEnum  
    Product.Type
